"Eye Care is an innovative application designed to help people detect the potential risk of cataracts early. This application combines artificial intelligence technology and image analysis to assess the possibility of cataracts based on photos of the user's eyes.

Select between the option of capturing the image of the eye or picking the image from gallery. When capturing an image with the camera, capture the image close to the eye and center the eye in the image. There will be a preview of the selected/captured image. Decide between choosing another image or submitting the previewed one. The result will be then displayed after submitting an image.
Please consult a medical professional immediately
